ygData.subject: Re: Frigid Callings

Nightshift watched as the cloud of insects flew out of sight.=A0 Yet he was=
 still shaking from his ordeal.
=A0
" I think they got shook up too, but Pr=
imus knows where they're headed.=A0"
=A0
He turns to Wolfgang.
=A0
" I neve=
r told anyone else this, but when I was in stasis, I had a dream.=A0 But it=
 wasn't just any regular dream.=A0 It was raining and I was standn' out ove=
r the Ark, lookn' up at the sky.=A0 It was almost as black as my fur, but t=
hrough that darkness, I saw light.=A0 Like lightning, through the storm clo=
uds.=A0 It shimmered like lightning, but then somethn' broke through those =
clouds.=A0 Well, almost completely broke through, and behind the thin cover=
, I could see my big buddie's shape, with his long tail trailn' behind him,=
 and then, what sounded like thunder came outa his mouth and when he roared=
, I could see pebbles jump'n on the ground, and feel the vibration under my=
 paws.=A0 And after he roared, the sky opened up and you could see this rea=
lly bright light kinda filtering through on the ground.=A0 Then, I woke up.=
"
=A0
He puts a paw on Wolfgang's shoulder.

"Master Yoketron believed that=
 dreams that seemed almost real, were reflections of what was ta come in ou=
r lives.=A0 I have a really good feeln' we're all gonna come outa this on t=
op.=A0 And things will get better.=A0 I know they will.=A0 Because when you=
 hear that thunder through the clouds, you know change is in the forecast."
--1038709272-1429907933-1323279719=:39523

> </div>
<div style=3D"RIGHT: auto">He turns to Wolfgang.</div>
<div s=
tyle=3D"RIGHT: auto"> </div>
<div style=3D"RIGHT: auto">" I never told=
 anyone else this, but when I was in stasis, I had a dream.  But it wa=
sn't just any regular dream.  It was raining and I was standn' out ove=
r the Ark, lookn' up at the sky.  It was almost as black as my fur, bu=
t through that darkness, I saw light.  Like lightning, through the sto=
rm clouds.  It shimmered like lightning, but then somethn' broke throu=
gh those clouds.  Well, almost completely broke through, and behind th=
e thin cover, I could see my big buddie's shape, with his long tail trailn'=
 behind him, and then, what sounded like thunder came outa his mouth and wh=
en he roared, I could see pebbles jump'n on the ground, and feel the vibrat=
ion under my paws.  And after he roared, the sky opened up and you cou=
ld see this really bright light kinda filtering through on the ground.&nbsp=
; Then, I woke up."</div>
<div style=3D"RIGHT: auto"> </div>
<div styl=
e=3D"RIGHT: auto">He puts a paw on Wolfgang's shoulder.</div>
<div style=3D=
"RIGHT: auto"><BR style=3D"RIGHT: auto">"Master Yoketron believed that drea=
ms that seemed almost real, were reflections of what was ta come in our liv=
es.  I have a really good feeln' we're all gonna come outa this on top=
.  And things will get better.  I know they will.  Because w=
hen you hear that thunder through the clouds, you know change is in the for=
ecast."<VAR id=3Dyui-ie-cursor></VAR></div></div></body></html>
